message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm looking to save as much as I can on this purchase.

Bob, while I understand you're looking for a good deal, $9,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to be closer to my initial offer. How about $11,500?  This still gives you a great value, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $10,000? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really need to stick to my budget.
